changelog.title: Account Information Dashboard & UI Improvements
changes: 💰 NEW: Account balance display with real-time updates
🏢 NEW: Subaccounts panel showing names, keys, and balances
📊 NEW: Side-by-side layout for credentials and account info
📱 NEW: Responsive grid layout (stacks on mobile)
🔄 NEW: Refresh button for account information
🎨 NEW: Versioning system with changelog modal
🔧 FIX: Header button layout (no more overlapping)
🔧 FIX: Connect button functionality issues
🐛 FIX: Missing Pydantic models causing deployment errors
⚡ NEW: /api/account/info endpoint combining balance + subaccounts
🎨 NEW: Vonage logo added to header (top left corner)
💳 NEW: Credit limit display for master account and subaccounts

changelog.title: Multi-User Architecture
changes: ✨ NEW: Multi-user support - each user provides their own credentials
🔒 SECURITY: Per-user session management instead of global credentials
🚫 REMOVED: Environment variable dependency for API keys
🔄 IMPROVED: Dynamic connect/disconnect functionality
📱 NEW: Real-time connection status checking
🎨 UI: Updated interface to reflect multi-user capabilities

changelog.title: Render Deployment Compatibility
changes: 🐛 FIX: FastAPI startup event compatibility
📦 FIX: Dependency conflicts for cloud deployment
🐍 FIX: Python 3.11 compatibility for Render
⚙️ IMPROVED: Runtime configuration for deployment

changelog.title: Enhanced Web Interface
changes: 🔐 NEW: HTTP Basic Authentication for security
🌐 NEW: CORS middleware for cross-origin requests
📊 NEW: Health check endpoints
🎨 IMPROVED: Web interface styling and UX
